editorialNotes.short: Something's very wrong here. Can you get out alive?

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't let the zombies stop you

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The unstoppable, poppable Bloons series gets better with each installment, and this entry in the cute-but-cunning tower-defense franchise is no exception. Bloons TD 5 is adorable and quirky, but theres an astonishing amount of content, tactical depth, and replayability to go along with the goofy weapons, helium-filled interlopers, and priceless monkey business.

Sure, there are skateboarding games that let you pull 900s from telephone wires, then land in a manual, collecting millions of points. But when you want realism and complexity, you want True Skate. For years, True Axis skateboarding simulator has been letting us ollie, grind and kickflip with our fingers. Competing with your friends, scouting gaps and completing missions is great fun, but the true reward is perfecting a line and nailing incredible tricks with just the right swipes.
The latest in this gorgeous, long-running tower defence series adds cool twists, like playing with two heroes at once.
Randomly generated levels keep every punishing platforming challenge fresh as you dash to save your kid.
This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

editorialNotes.tagline: Still trying to get over it TBH

editorialNotes.standard: Mash through waves of foes as a heavily armed potato in this spud-tacular arena survival game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Tiny Wings has been a longtime favorite of ours, thanks to its gentle vibe, fantastic music, and surprisingly awesome one-touch gameplay. Outrunning the sun across procedurally generated islands is rewarding and relaxing, and we love the added challenge of the four-bird race mode. The games vivid, vibrant colors absolutely dazzle on Apple TVwe feel like were meeting our flightless friends for the first time again.

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Take command in World War II

editorialNotes.standard: There sure is a lot of debris in space. So if you want to survive as an intergalactic pilot, youll need to think fast. Thankfully, dodging and weaving through Hyperburners gorgeous levels is pure exhilaration. We love how beating stages rewards us with faster shipsit means the better we get, the harder the game gets.

name: Give It Up! - Jump to the Beat
Who is your Rich Daddy Games

editorialNotes.standard: Badland is an eerie sidescroller in which you guide a nondescript creature through creepy and perilous environments. Thanks to simple controls and obvious objectives, the game is instantly accessible, but winding levels and unique power-ups make each stage an exercise in careful timing and hasty strategies. As the gameplay evolves and becomes increasingly bizarre, Badland remains incredibly fun.

editorialNotes.short: Explore endless vertical worlds controlling a four-legged alien.

ios.subtitle: Its not a bug, its a feature

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: So much more than a simple action game, Duet elevates the act of dodging falling blocks into something captivating, beautiful, even profound. A stirring soundtrack and striking visuals almost guarantee youll lose yourself in each stage, and as you learn the patterns and find yourself avoiding obstacles by sheer instinct, youll feel an overwhelming surge of triumph.
editorialNotes.short: Two vessels play out lifes duality.

editorialNotes.standard: Catchy music, incredible combo-filled combat, co-op play, and a blast of nostalgic spirit ensures this classic brawling series still packs a punch.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, its as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.
